examples.example: 下次见面的时候，我们一定要好好聊聊。

translate.english: When we meet next time, we must have a good chat.

examples.example: 我期待着下次的旅行，相信那一定会非常精彩。

translate.english: I am looking forward to the next trip and believe it will be extremely wonderful.

examples.example: 下次有机会，我一定要去尝试那个期待已久的新项目。

translate.english: Next time there is an opportunity, I must go and try that long-awaited new project.
